item.name: TBCDGREG
item.oninsert: IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCDGREG WHERE CODATR = @CODATR AND CODCMF = @CODCMF)) SET @RETURN_VALUE = -2

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos

insertcommand.pre:
IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADEND (NOLOCK) WHERE CODCAD = @CODCAD AND DSCEND=@DSCEND AND TIPEND=@TIPEND)) BEGIN SET @RETURN_VALUE=-2; END
IF(@TIPEND = 3) BEGIN IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADEND (NOLOCK) WHERE CODCAD <> @CODCAD AND DSCEND=@DSCEND AND TIPEND=@TIPEND)) SET @RETURN_VALUE=-3 END
insertcommand.pos: IF(@FLGATV=1 AND @REGATV=1 AND @RETURN_VALUE > 0) BEGIN UPDATE TBCADEND SET REGATV=0 WHERE REGATV = 1 AND CODCAD = @CODCAD AND TIPEND = @TIPEND AND CODEND <> @RETURN_VALUE END

updatecommand.pre:
IF(NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADEND (NOLOCK) WHERE CODEND= @CODEND)) BEGIN SET @RETURN_VALUE=-2; END
IF(@TIPEND = 3) BEGIN IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADEND (NOLOCK) WHERE CODCAD <> @CODCAD AND DSCEND=@DSCEND AND TIPEND=@TIPEND)) SET @RETURN_VALUE=-3 END
updatecommand.pos: IF(@FLGATV=1 AND @REGATV=1 AND @RETURN_VALUE > 0) BEGIN UPDATE TBCADEND SET REGATV=0 WHERE REGATV = 1 AND CODCAD = @CODCAD AND TIPEND = @TIPEND AND CODEND <> @RETURN_VALUE END

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos

Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos

insertcommand.pos: IF(@FLAGATV=1 AND @REGATV=1 AND @RETURN_VALUE > 0) BEGIN UPDATE TBCADCTO SET REGATV=0 WHERE REGATV = 1 AND CODCAD = @CODCAD AND TIPCTO = @TIPCTO AND CODCTO <> @RETURN_VALUE END

updatecommand.pre: IF(NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADCTO (NOLOCK) WHERE CODCTO= @CODCTO)) BEGIN SET @RETURN_VALUE=-2; END
updatecommand.pos: IF(@FLGATV=1 AND @REGATV=1 AND @RETURN_VALUE > 0) BEGIN UPDATE TBCADCTO SET REGATV=0 WHERE REGATV = 1 AND CODCAD = @CODCAD AND TIPCTO = @TIPCTO AND CODCTO <> @RETURN_VALUE END

item.name: TBCADTAR
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT NIDTAR, A.CODCAD, CODTAR, CODMOE, FMTCOB, ISNULL(D.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCFMT, VLRTAR, VLRAGR, VLRINF, VLRMAX, TARCPL, FMTAGR, A.STAREC, DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU, ISNULL(E.NOMUSU,'') AS NOMUSU FROM TBCADTAR A INNER JOIN TBCDGREG B ON (A.CODCAD = B.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR C ON (A.STAREC = C.STAREC) INNER JOIN TBTABGER D ON (30 = D.NUMTAB AND A.FMTCOB = D.KEYCOD) LEFT JOIN TBCDGREG E ON (A.UPDUSU = E.CODCAD)

item.name: TBCRTREG
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT CODCRT, CODPDC, ASSUSU, LOTINT, ORIATV, DATCAN, DATATV, NIDCRT, NIDLOT, NUMCRT, NOMPRT, VALMES, VALANO, STACRT, PSWCRT, NOMCR1, NOMCR2, NOMCR3, SRCORI, A.STAREC, C.DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU, ISNULL(E.NOMUSU,'') AS NOMUSU FROM TBCRTREG A LEFT JOIN TBCDGREG B ON (A.ASSUSU = B.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR C ON (A.STAREC = C.STAREC) LEFT JOIN TBCDGREG E ON (A.UPDUSU = E.CODCAD)

item.name: TBTIPLCT
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT TIPLCT, DSSLCT, A.STAREC, B.DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU, ISNULL(C.NOMUSU,'') AS NOMUSU FROM TBTIPLCT A INNER JOIN TBCADSTR B ON (A.STAREC = B.STAREC) LEFT JOIN TBCDGREG C ON (A.UPDUSU = C.CODCAD)

item.name: TBMNSREG
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT NIDMNS, A.TIPLCT, C.DSCLCT, APRUSU, DATMOV, DATVCT, A.CODCAD, B.NOMUSU NUMMES, NUMANO, TIPMNS, NUMPCL, NIDBOL, TIPVAL, ISNULL(D.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCTVL, A.SIGOPE, VLRMOV, A.DSCMOV, TIPEXT, CODEXT, SRCDAT, LOTINT, LOTFIN, A.STAREC, E.DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU FROM TBMNSREG A INNER JOIN TBCDGREG B ON (A.CODCAD = B.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBTIPLCT C ON (A.TIPLCT = C.TIPLCT) INNER JOIN TBTABGER D ON (100 = D.NUMTAB AND A.TIPVAL = D.KEYCOD) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR E ON (A.STAREC = E.STAREC)

item.name: TBLOTREG
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT A.NIDLOT, A.CODGST, B.NOMUSU AS NOMGST, A.CODPRO,C.DSCPRO, A.CODCAD, D.NOMUSU,A.STAANT, A.STALOT, E.DSCSTA,A.TIPREG, A.TIPBOL, F.DSCTBL,A.DATSOL, A.DATREC, A.NUMQTD,A.VLRUNI, A.VLRLOT, A.VLRUCV,A.VLRUCR, A.VLRMEN, A.RSPMEN,ISNULL(I.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCRSP, A.NIDBOL, A.DATVCT, A.STAREC,G.DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU, H.LGNUSU FROM TBLOTREG (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBCDGREG (NOLOCK) B ON (A.CODGST = B.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBCADPRO (NOLOCK) C ON (A.CODPRO = C.CODPRO) INNER JOIN TBCDGREG (NOLOCK) D ON (A.CODCAD = D.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBCADSTA (NOLOCK) E ON (A.STALOT = E.CODSTA) INNER JOIN TBTIPBOL (NOLOCK) F ON (A.TIPBOL = F.TIPBOL) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR (NOLOCK) G ON (A.STAREC = G.STAREC) INNER JOIN TBTABGER (NOLOCK) I ON (58 = I.NUMTAB AND A.RSPMEN = I.KEYCOD) LEFT JOIN TBCDGLGN (NOLOCK) H ON (A.UPDUSU = H.CODCAD)

item.name: TBCRTDET
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT A.NIDDET, A.CODCRT, A.NUMPRN, A.USUCOB, A.TIPMNS, A.STAMEN, A.NUMMES, A.NUMANO, A.DATVCT, A.NUMPCL, A.VLRREG, A.LOTINT, A.NIDMNS, A.STAREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU FROM TBCRTDET A

item.name: TBCADMOV
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT A.CODMOV, A.SIGOPE, ISNULL(D.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCOPE, A.CODGER, A.CODSUM, A.DSCMOV, A.DSCEXT, A.TIPBLO, ISNULL(C.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCBLO, A.DURBLO, A.STAREC, B.DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU, ISNULL(E.NOMUSU,'') AS NOMUSU FROM TBCADMOV A INNER JOIN TBCADSTR B ON (A.STAREC = B.STAREC) INNER JOIN TBTABGER C ON (29 = C.NUMTAB AND A.TIPBLO = C.KEYCOD) INNER JOIN TBTABGER D ON (10 = D.NUMTAB AND A.SIGOPE = D.KEYCOD) LEFT JOIN TBCDGREG E ON (A.UPDUSU = E.CODCAD)

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
item.query: select a.codatr, a.dscatr, a.aplcta, a.starec, b.dscrec, a.updusu, isnull(c.lgnusu,'') as lgnusu from tbcadatr (nolock) a inner join TBCADSTR (nolock) b on (a.starec = b.starec) left join TBCDGLGN (nolock) c on (a.UPDUSU = c.codcad)

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos

item.query: select a.codopr, a.dscopr, a.starec, b.dscrec, a.updusu, isnull(c.lgnusu,'') as lgnusu from tbcadopr (nolock) a inner join TBCADSTR (nolock) b on (a.starec = b.starec) left join TBCDGLGN (nolock) c on (a.UPDUSU = c.codcad)

item.desc: Cria Base de Registros para exportação de Dados
item.query: select a.codopr, a.dscopr from tbcadopr (nolock) a where starec=1

item.name: TBSRCAPI
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT CODAPI,DSCAPI FROM TBSRCAPI (NOLOCK) A WHERE STAREC=1

item.name: TBAPIUSU
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT CODCAD,CODAPI,B.DSCAPI FROM TBAPIUSU (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBSRCAPI (NOLOCK) B ON (A.CODAPI = B.CODAPI)

insertcommand.pre: IF(@ORGCTA = 1) BEGIN SET @NUMCTA = RIGHT('00' + CAST(@TIPCTA AS VARCHAR),02) + '01' + RIGHT('0000000' + CAST(@CODCAD AS VARCHAR),07) SET @NUMDVE = STR(CAST(@NUMCTA AS BIGINT) % 9,1) SET @NUMBCO=0; END BEGIN IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADCTA (NOLOCK) WHERE CODCAD = @CODCAD AND NUMAGE = @NUMAGE AND NUMBCO = @NUMBCO and NUMCTA = @NUMCTA AND NUMDVE = @NUMDVE)) BEGIN SET @RETURN_VALUE=-2 END

updatecommand.pre: BEGIN IF(EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBCADCTA (NOLOCK) WHERE CODCAD = @CODCAD AND NUMAGE = @NUMAGE AND NUMBCO = @NUMBCO and NUMCTA = @NUMCTA AND NUMDVE = @NUMDVE AND NIDCTA != @NIDCTA)) BEGIN SET @RETURN_VALUE=-2 END

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
item.query: SELECT A.NIDCTA, A.CODCAD, B.NOMUSU, A.TIPCTA, ISNULL(C.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCTIP, A.NUMAGE, A.NUMBCO, E.DSCBCO, A.NUMCTA, A.NUMDVE, A.ORGCTA, ISNULL(D.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCORG, A.STACTA, F.DSCSTA, A.DATVAL, A.DATINI, A.VLRLIM, A.APLTRF, A.TIPBNF, ISNULL(H.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCBNF, A.CODCMF, A.NOMBNF, A.STAREC, G.DSCREC, A.DATCAD, A.DATUPD, A.UPDUSU, ISNULL(I.LGNUSU,'') AS LGNUSU FROM TBCADCTA (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBCDGREG (NOLOCK) B ON (A.CODCAD = B.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBCDGLGN (NOLOCK) I ON (A.CODCAD = I.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBTABGER (NOLOCK) C ON (22 = C.NUMTAB AND A.TIPCTA = C.KEYCOD) INNER JOIN TBTABGER (NOLOCK) D ON (23 = D.NUMTAB AND A.ORGCTA = D.KEYCOD) INNER JOIN TBCADBCO (NOLOCK) E ON (A.NUMBCO = E.NUMBCO) INNER JOIN TBCADSTA (NOLOCK) F ON (A.STACTA = F.CODSTA) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR (NOLOCK) G ON (A.STAREC = G.STAREC) INNER JOIN TBTABGER (NOLOCK) H ON (20 = H.NUMTAB AND A.TIPBNF = H.KEYCOD)

item.name: TBCADPRO
item.StringSqlSelectAll: SELECT A.CODPRO, A.DSCPRO, A.NOMFAN, A.TIMTOK, A.VLRMEN, A.VLRUCV, A.VLRUCR,A.STAREC, B.DSCREC, C.LGNUSU FROM TBCADPRO (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBCADSTR (NOLOCK) B ON (A.STAREC = B.STAREC) LEFT JOIN TBCDGLGN (NOLOCK) C ON (A.UPDUSU = C.CODCAD)

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
item.query: SELECT A.*, B.DSCTAR, C.DSCTAR AS DSCCMS, D.DSCREC, ISNULL(E.LGNUSU,'') AS LGNUSU FROM TBTIPBOL (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBTIPTAR (NOLOCK) B ON (A.CODTAR = B.CODTAR) INNER JOIN TBTIPTAR (NOLOCK) C ON (A.CODCMS = C.CODTAR) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR (NOLOCK) D ON (A.STAREC = D.STAREC) INNER JOIN TBCDGLGN (NOLOCK) E ON (A.UPDUSU = E.CODCAD)

item.desc: Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
Seleciona todos os registros com base nos parâmetros fornecidos
item.query: SELECT A.TIPVAL, A.DSCTVL, A.SIGOPE, A.STAREC, B.DSCREC, ISNULL(C.LGNUSU,'') AS LGNUSU, A.APLSB1,A.APLSB2,A.APLSB3,A.APLSB4,A.APLSB5,A.APLSB6,A.APLSB7 FROM TBTIPVAL (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBCADSTR (NOLOCK) B ON (A.STAREC = B.STAREC) INNER JOIN TBCDGLGN (NOLOCK) C ON (A.UPDUSU = C.CODCAD)

item.query: SELECT A.IDAPLB, A.TIPBOL, B.DSCTBL, A.CODTAR, F.DSCTAR, A.APLBOL, ISNULL(C.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCAPL, A.AGRPCP, ISNULL(D.DSCTAB,'') AS DSCAGR, A.STAREC, G.DSCREC, A.UPDUSU, E.LGNUSU, A.TIPVAL, H,DSCTVL FROM TBAPLBOL (NOLOCK) A INNER JOIN TBTIPBOL (NOLOCK) B ON (A.TIPBOL = B.TIPBOL) INNER JOIN TBTABGER (NOLOCK) C ON (52 = C.NUMTAB AND A.APLBOL = C.KEYCOD) INNER JOIN TBTABGER (NOLOCK) D ON (53 = D.NUMTAB AND A.AGRPCP = D.KEYCOD) INNER JOIN TBCDGLGN (NOLOCK) E ON (A.UPDUSU = E.CODCAD) INNER JOIN TBTIPTAR (NOLOCK) F ON (A.CODTAR = F.CODTAR) INNER JOIN TBCADSTR (NOLOCK) G ON (A.STAREC = G.DSCREC) INNER JOIN TBTIPVAL (NOLOCK) H ON (A.TIPVAL = H.TIPVAL)

item.query: SELECT a.keytab, a.starec, b.dscrec, a.numtab, a.keycod, a.keytxt,a.numref, a.dsctab,a.updusu, isnull(c.lgnusu,'') as lgnusu FROM tbtabger (NOLOCK) a INNER JOIN tbcadstr (NOLOCK) b ON (a.starec = b.starec) LEFT JOIN tbcdglgn (NOLOCK) c ON (a.updusu = c.codcad)

list.description: Código de condição de Atividade de Registro

lists.list: select 0 as keycod, 'Inativo' as dsctab union select 1 as keycod, 'Ativo' as dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=54 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select codtar, dsctar from tbtiptar (nolock) where starec=1 order by dsctar
select codpai, dscpai from tbcadpai (nolock) where starec=1 order by dscpai
select starec, dscrec from tbcadstr (nolock) order by starec
select codufe, dscufe from tbcadufe (nolock) where starec=1 order by codufe
select tipend, dscten from tbtipend (nolock) where starec<>0 order by dscten
select tiplog, dsclog from tbtiplog (nolock) where starec<>0 order by dsclog
select codopr, dscopr from tbcadopr (nolock) where starec=1 order by codopr
select tiplct, dsclct from tbtiplct (nolock) where starec=1 order by dsclct
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=29 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=10 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select tipusu, dsctus from tbtipusu (nolock) where starec=1 order by dsctus
select codatr, dscatr from tbcadatr (nolock) where starec=1 order by dscatr
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=402 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=59 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=58 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select tipbol, dsctbl from tbtipbol (nolock) where starec=1 order by dsctbl
select keytxt, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=9 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keytxt, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=13 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=60 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=56 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=22 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=23 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=20 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select codpro, dscpro from tbcadpro (nolock) where starec=1 order by dscpro
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=55 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select tipval, dsctvl from tbtipval (nolock) where starec=1
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=53 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=52 and starec=1 order by dsctab
select tipcto, dsccto from tbtipcto (nolock) where starec=1
select numbco, dscbco from tbcadbco (nolock) where starec=1
select keycod, dsctab from tbtabger (nolock) where numtab=0 and starec=1 order by KEYCOD
